channel.title: 3.1 Create Gateway Endpoint :: Deploy TensorFlow model on AWS with EC2 and Docker
channel.description: Gateway Endpoint is a gateway that helps you connect to S3 from your VPC without using Internet Gateway and no additional charge. Besides gateway endpoint, S3 and DynamoDB also support interface endpoint. In this lab, in order for EC2 instance to have the right to access S3, you will create an IAM Role for reading from S3. Create IAM Role for reading files from S3 Go to IAM Console: Click Roles, then Create role.
